text: (electronic music)
Legacy .NET applications burden organizations
with high licensing costs and outdated technology,
but the lengthy manual modernization processes
often delay innovation.
Enter Amazon Q Developer,
the first generative AI-powered assistant
for large-scale porting of .NET applications.
It uses AI-powered agents guided by users
to tackle complex projects,
driving speed, quality, and collaboration.
To get started with the web experience,
select .NET Transformation
or use chat to tell Q Developer your goals.
Q will then help you set up a modernization project.
Connect your GitHub repository.
Q Developer scans your linked repository,
finds suitable projects and lets you customize selections.
Choose projects to modernize with admin approval.
Once approved, the agent automatically ports
your .NET applications to the selected version,
from Windows to Linux.
You can monitor the transformation's progress
via the dashboard and worklogs.
Q Developer commits the transformed code
to a new branch in your repository once a task is complete,
preserving the original source code.
Amazon Q Developer transformation capabilities
enable you to plan and execute .NET porting
of hundreds of applications simultaneously.
This can accelerate your transformation process
by up to four times,
and reduce Windows server licensing costs by up to 40%.
The same capabilities are also available
within the Visual Studio IDE
for transforming specific applications.
Get started with Amazon Q Developer today.
(electronic music)
